title: Strattec Security Corporation (STRT) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 09, 2015
content:
Strattec Security Corporation ( STRT ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 09, 2015. A cash
dividend payment of $0.13 per share is scheduled to be paid on
September 25, 2015. Shareholders who purchased STRT prior to the
ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This
represents an 8.33% increase over the prior quarter. At the current
stock price of $62.8, the dividend yield is .83%. 
 
The previous trading day's last sale of STRT was $62.8,
representing a -43.4% decrease from the 52 week high of $110.96 and
a 4.48% increase over the 52 week low of $60.11. 
 
STRT is a part of the Capital Goods sector, which includes
companies such as Honeywell International Inc. ( HON ) and Delphi Automotive plc ( DLPH ). STRT's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's
profitability, is $5.66. 

For more information on the declaration, record and payment
dates, visit the STRT
Dividend History page. Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today. 
 

  The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of The NASDAQ OMX Group, Inc.
